Package com.msasc.lib.task.progress

Interface ProgressListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProgressMonitor
public interface ProgressListener
Listener of the progress of tasks and processes. Note that progress bar zero is the main progress bar that indicates whether the whole listener is determinate or not.
Author:
Miquel Sas

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    notifyEnd()
    Notify that the calling task has finished.
    void
    notifyMessage(int index, String message)
    Notify a progress message, normally when the task is indeterminate.
    void
    notifyProgress(int index, double workIncrease, double totalWork)
    Notify an increase in the work done.
    void
    notifyStart()
    Notify that the calling task has started.
    void
    setIndeterminate(int index, boolean indeterminate)
    Set that the progress bar is indeterminate.
    void
    setup(int numLabels, int numBars)
    Initialize and setup the listener to manage the argument number of labels and progress bars.

  • Method Details

    • notifyStart

      void notifyStart()
      Notify that the calling task has started.

    • notifyEnd

      void notifyEnd()
      Notify that the calling task has finished.

    • notifyMessage

      void notifyMessage(int index, String message)
      Notify a progress message, normally when the task is indeterminate.
      Parameters:
      index - The message index.
      message - The message.

    • notifyProgress

      void notifyProgress(int index, double workIncrease, double totalWork)
      Notify an increase in the work done. Zero or negative work increases or total work are not considered and skipped. Additionally, in an indeterminate state, work and total are also skipped.
      Parameters:
      index - Progress bar index.
      workIncrease - Work increase.
      totalWork - Total work.

    • setIndeterminate

      void setIndeterminate(int index, boolean indeterminate)
      Set that the progress bar is indeterminate.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the progress bar.
      indeterminate - A boolean.

    • setup

      void setup(int numLabels, int numBars)
      Initialize and setup the listener to manage the argument number of labels and progress bars.
      Parameters:
      numLabels - Number of labels.
      numBars - Number of progress bars.
